title: Transistor-CODEX
description:
::::::::: CODEX PRESENTS :::::::::


:::: Transistor ::::


::Information::


Transistor

Release Date: 5/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action/RPG

From the creators of Bastion, Transistor is a sci-fi themed action RPG that
invites you to wield an extraordinary weapon of unknown origin as you fight
through a stunning futuristic city. Transistor seamlessly integrates
thoughtful strategic planning into a fast-paced action experience, melding
responsive gameplay and rich atmospheric storytelling. During the course of
the adventure, you will piece together the Transistor's mysteries as you
pursue its former owners

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
Play

Note: You must start the game from one of the shortcuts (x86 and x64)!!
Savegames are individual for x86 and x64 versions

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows 7 32-bit 
Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: 1GB of VRAM: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
